description:
Learn how to implement a profitable, personalized, sustainable recycling solution for your company. Save money for your company while saving the planet!

The course, How to Profit Millions with a Recycling Program, covers a systematic approach to designing, developing, and implementing a recycling program for your company or organization.

The information is presented by Steven Rosenberg, a recognized recycling expert. He is CEO of Green Purpose, the worldâ€™s greenest eco-capitalist enterprise. Steven has created 25 video lectures, in which he provides you with a proven, step-by-step method for successful corporate recycling. He also provides downloadable PDF resources and checklists to help you create your own recycling program.

The course is designed for those who wish to implement a successful recycling program at their company, corporation, or organization. The focus is on profiting from recycling materials that may have gone to the landfill.

Steven Rosenberg has worked with Fortune 500 companies to implement Zero Waste programs that saved them tens, and sometimes hundreds, of thousands of dollars.
title: How to Profit Millions With a Recycling Program
